publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-469 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Waste Wise Armadale—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Armadale on their ownership and participation in the pilot waste-minimisation project, Waste Wise Armadale; notes that with Scotland’s waste increasing by over 2% per year it is encouraging to see a community reducing its waste by an average of 4.4% per fortnight; commends the community of Armadale for further demonstrating its ability to respond as an above-average 3 Rs (reduce, reuse, recycling) community, and encourages other areas in Scotland to adopt similiar local intitiatives to tackle this issue.

S3M-469 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Waste Wise Armadale—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Armadale on their ownership and participation in the pilot waste-minimisation project, Waste Wise Armadale; notes that with Scotland’s waste increasing by over 2% per year it is encouraging to see a community reducing its waste by an average of 4.4% per fortnight; commends the community of Armadale for further demonstrating its ability to respond as an above-average 3 Rs (reduce, reuse, recycling) community, and encourages other areas in Scotland to adopt similiar local intitiatives to tackle this issue. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Patrick Harvie*, Bashir Ahmad*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, Robin Harper*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-469 Waste Wise Armadale (lodged on 13 September 2007) Rob Gibson*
S3M-469 Waste Wise Armadale (lodged on 13 September 2007) Ian McKee*, Jamie Hepburn*, Keith Brown*
S3M-469 Waste Wise Armadale (lodged on 13 September 2007) Bill Wilson*
